titleStmt.title: Nevvs from Tybvrn, or, a full and true relation of the confession and execution of John Rendor Charles Casby, VVilliam Pungly, Nathaniel VVarden, Henry Milbourn, Francis Bennet, Ellen Bayly, James VVoodman. All which were executed on Wednesday the 16. of this instant September 1674.

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 3 reads: News from Nevvgate. Or The confession of those that were executed.
Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library, London.
